name: Life is Strange - Episode 3: Chaos Theory
name_original: Life is Strange - Episode 3: Chaos Theory
description:
Life is Strange - Episode 3: Chaos Theory is an adventure game developed by DONTNOD Entertainment. It came out on 19-05-2015. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Life is Strange - Episode 3: Chaos Theory is available on PC.
